author: "Hofmann, Matthaeus, 1615-1667"
title: "Chronotaxi Apocalyptica, visionibus Apocalypticis certas temporum periodos assignans, assignatas e textu, locisque parallelis eruens, ac probans; probatis fata Ecclesiae applicans; adeoque viam ad genuinum totius Apocalypseos sensum ostendens. Studio viri"
